comments.creator: amitbs@gmail.com
comments.text:
Even i am facing the same problem - but not every time or say every condition. It is becoming specific to some condition don't know whey - but it happens for me. 
I tried debugging the same by throwing alerts / setting flags ... so the function aint called multiple times and so forth but what to my surprise was noticed that the function was called only once but the ajax calls registered in the network were 4 for me. And to my surprise - the output of the ajax calls was never been thrown back to the console but for this specific request - it throws back 3 times (out of 4 ajax calls). The problem with this is - the functionality technically fails to update my content where i am replacing a section with some object - it rather replaces the same with blank.
comments.raw_text:
Even i am facing the same problem - but not every time or say every condition. It is becoming specific to some condition don't know whey - but it happens for me. 
I tried debugging the same by throwing alerts / setting flags ... so the function aint called multiple times and so forth but what to my surprise was noticed that the function was called only once but the ajax calls registered in the network were 4 for me. And to my surprise - the output of the ajax calls was never been thrown back to the console but for this specific request - it throws back 3 times (out of 4 ajax calls). The problem with this is - the functionality technically fails to update my content where i am replacing a section with some object - it rather replaces the same with blank.
comments.author: amitbs@gmail.com
